text: jin logon ko hamane kitaab pradaan kee hai ve usase, jo tumhaaree or utaara hai, harshit hote hai aur vibhinn girohon ke kuchh log aise bhee hai jo usakee kuchh baaton ka inakaar karate hai. kah do, "mujhe par bas yah aadesh hua hai ki main allaah kee bandagee karoon aur usaka sahabhaagee na thaharaoon. main usee kee or bulaata hoon aur usee kee or mujhe lautakar jaana hai.
